about_the_game:
Rise through the ranks and become a legendary commander.

Get behind the guns of a submarine and lead it into thrilling battles against formidable enemy convoys! Use your torpedoes to sink enemy armadas and rise through the ranks to become an admiral of the U-boat fleet.

Dive into tactical naval warfare against enemy fleets!

Explore underwater areas of arctic wastelands, canyons, abyss and sunken temples to get tactical advantage in war and prepare an ambush. Engage in marine events, tactical missions, and naval challenges to earn valuable resources. Dominate the seas and showcase your naval prowess.

Features:

  • Variety of Authentic Ships: Track and destroy real warships with precision.

  • Realistic Damage Effects: Experience intense combat scenarios with diverse damage types.

  • Three Game Modes: Engage in naval battles, liberate territories, or complete as many missions as possible.

  • Upgrades and Ammunition: Enhance your submarine's stats and equip it with various types of missiles.

  • Boosters: Gain an edge over your enemies with boosters like armor, air support, instant reload, thermal vision, and more.

  • Bonus Missions: Look up and destroy all enemy planes

  • Stunning Graphics and Locations: Immerse yourself in the game with realistic visuals.

Are you ready for the ultimate naval warfare simulator?

name: Uboat Attack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Become a legendary commander in the ultimate naval warfare simulator! Command a powerful submarine, unleash devastating torpedoes, and crush enemy armadas. Conquer tactical missions, dominate the seas, and rise through the ranks. Experience breathtaking combat and forge your path to naval supremacy!
